apihelp-mobileview-param-prop-withimages:
Quala informo obtenar:
;text:HTML de la selektita secioni.
;sections:Informo pri omna secioni di la pagino.
;normalizedtitle:Titulo di la pagino, normaligata.
;lastmodified:''Timestamp'' ISO 8601 pri kande la pagino modifikesis lastafoye, exemple "2014-04-13T22:42:14Z".
;lastmodifiedby:Informo pri la lasta uzero qua modifikis ca pagino.
;revision:Return the current revision ID of the page.
;protection:Information about protection level.
;editable:Whether the current user can edit this page. This includes all factors for logged-in users but not blocked status for anons.
;languagecount:Number of languages that the page is available in.
;hasvariants:Whether or not the page is available in other language variants.
;displaytitle:The rendered title of the page, with {{DISPLAYTITLE}} and such applied.
;pageprops:Propraji di la pagino.
;image:Informo pri imajo asociita kun ca pagino.
;thumb:Miniaturo di imajo asociita kun ca pagino.
apihelp-mobileview-param-pageprops: Quala propraji di la pagini montrar, uzanta ("|") por separar l'elementi de la listo, o "*" por omna propraji.
